## Emitter interface

A simple event emitter interface used to implement the observer pattern throughout the codebase.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Emitter<E extends EventsType> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addEventListener(eventName, listener)](./post-me.emitter.addeventlistener.md) | Add a listener to a specific event. |
|  [once(eventName)](./post-me.emitter.once.md) | Add a listener to a specific event, that will only be invoked once |
|  [removeEventListener(eventName, listener)](./post-me.emitter.removeeventlistener.md) | Remove a listener from a specific event. |
